analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalizeCrowdsale (/unique_contracts/0x164979ed9b905b1e1c82cbbeee46379ba4d7b7d9.sol):
	External calls:
	- _toVest = controller.balanceOf(CROWDSALE_WALLET) (/unique_contracts/0x164979ed9b905b1e1c82cbbeee46379ba4d7b7d9.sol)
	- controller.transferWithEvent(CROWDSALE_WALLET,LIFE_CHANGE_VESTING_WALLET,_toVest) (/unique_contracts/0x164979ed9b905b1e1c82cbbeee46379ba4d7b7d9.sol)
	- controller.startVesting(_toVest,1545264000) (/unique_contracts/0x164979ed9b905b1e1c82cbbeee46379ba4d7b7d9.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleFinalized (/unique_contracts/0x164979ed9b905b1e1c82cbbeee46379ba4d7b7d9.sol)

Reentrancy in Controller.init (/unique_contracts/0x164979ed9b905b1e1c82cbbeee46379ba4d7b7d9.sol#192-203):
	External calls:
	- mintWithEvent(REWARDS_WALLET,9 * (10 ** (9 + DECIMALS))) (/unique_contracts/0x164979ed9b905b1e1c82cbbeee46379ba4d7b7d9.sol#193-194)
	- mintWithEvent(FRIENDS_FAMILY_WALLET,75 * (10 ** (6 + DECIMALS))) (/unique_contracts/0x164979ed9b905b1e1c82cbbeee46379ba4d7b7d9.sol#194-195)
	- mintWithEvent(CROWDSALE_WALLET,825 * (10 ** (6 + DECIMALS))) (/unique_contracts/0x164979ed9b905b1e1c82cbbeee46379ba4d7b7d9.sol#198-199)
	- mintWithEvent(LIFE_CHANGE_WALLET,100 * (10 ** (6 + DECIMALS))) (/unique_contracts/0x164979ed9b905b1e1c82cbbeee46379ba4d7b7d9.sol#199-202)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- initialized (/unique_contracts/0x164979ed9b905b1e1c82cbbeee46379ba4d7b7d9.sol#202-203)

Controller.withdrawVested (/unique_contracts/0x164979ed9b905b1e1c82cbbeee46379ba4d7b7d9.sol#253-281) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ledger.transfer(LIFE_CHANGE_VESTING_WALLET,_withdrawTo,amountWithdrawn) (/unique_contracts/0x164979ed9b905b1e1c82cbbeee46379ba4d7b7d9.sol#277-278)

Crowdsale.processPurchase (/unique_contracts/0x164979ed9b905b1e1c82cbbeee46379ba4d7b7d9.sol#458-469) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-controller.transferWithEvent(CROWDSALE_WALLET,_beneficiary,_tokensWithBonus) (/unique_contracts/0x164979ed9b905b1e1c82cbbeee46379ba4d7b7d9.sol#466-467)

Crowdsale.finalizeCrowdsale (/unique_contracts/0x164979ed9b905b1e1c82cbbeee46379ba4d7b7d9.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-controller.transferWithEvent(CROWDSALE_WALLET,LIFE_CHANGE_VESTING_WALLET,_toVest) (/unique_contracts/0x164979ed9b905b1e1c82cbbeee46379ba4d7b7d9.sol)
